Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could potentially want to bag $160 million Oklahoma City Thunder point guard to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic in stellar championship run
Article Text:
LeBron James and Luka Doncic (Image via Getty)

Los Angeles Lakers

Oklahoma City Thunder

star

Chris Paul

"The Spurs suddenly find themselves in an awkward position‚Äîtoo talented to tank naturally but not competitive enough to make a real playoff push without their franchise star,"

"It took over a decade, but Chris Paul might finally get his shot to wear the purple and gold."

Chris Paul (Image via Getty)

How would Chris Paul benefit the Los Angeles Lakers if the deal goes through?

Theare making waves in the Western Conference, solidifying their status as genuine contenders after a dominant 23-point victory over the 2023 NBA champions, the Denver Nuggets . With LeBron James and Luka Doncic still fine-tuning their chemistry, the Lakers are reportedly exploring ways to add a seasoned veteran to their roster. One name that has emerged as a potential target is former, who could become available via the buyout market.Paul, currently with the San Antonio Spurs, finds himself in a unique situation. The Spurs recently acquired guard De'Aaron Fox in a blockbuster trade, and with franchise cornerstone Victor Wembanyama sidelined for the rest of the season, the team is in a transitional phase. This has led to rumors that Paul and the Spurs may decide to split ways amicably so the 12-time All-Star may try to win his first NBA title.Fadeaway World has already predicted the Los Angeles Lakers as a likely destination for Paul if he hits the buyout market.wrote Eddie Bitar of Fadeaway World.Paul, now 39, has had a storied career, from his early days with the New Orleans to his impactful stints with the Thunder and Phoenix Suns. His leadership and adaptability have been widely praised, earning him a four-year, $159 million contract well into his 30s. Paul, who is renowned for his capacity to improve teams and people around him, is still a great asset despite his advanced age.For the Los Angeles Lakers, adding Paul could be a masterstroke. His friendship with LeBron James and his reputation as one of the league's most adaptable players make him an ideal fit. Paul's playmaking and veteran savvy could provide the Lakers with the stability and leadership needed to make a deep playoff run.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Milwaukee Bucks might benefit from signing $195 million Utah Jazz center to support Giannis Antetokounmpo Everyone will be watching Chris Paul as the buyout market heats up to see if he will finally don the purple and gold and possibly team up with LeBron James to win an NBA championship .
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are reportedly exploring ways to add a seasoned veteran to their roster. Chris paul could become available via the buyout market. The 39-year-old has had a storied career, from his early days with the new orleans to his impactful stints with the thunder and phoenix suns.

Article Title: Will Luka Doncic play tonight against the LA Clippers? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 28, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Luka Doncic playing tonight? (Image via Jayne Kamin-Oncea-Imagn Images)

Is Luka Doncic playing tonight? Los Angeles Lakers injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the LA Clippers (February 28, 2025)

Lakers injury report Feb 28 (Image via NBA)

LA Clippers injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the Los Angeles Lakers (February 28, 2025)

When and where to watch the Los Angeles Lakers play tonight against the LA Clippers (February 28, 2025)?

The Los Angeles Lakers are facing uncertainty ahead of their highly anticipated matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday, February 28, as star guard Luka Doncic is listed as a game-time decision due to a calf injury. The injury report, released earlier today, has left fans and analysts speculating about Doncic‚Äôs availability for the crucial divisional clash at Crypto.com Arena. Luka Doncic might be absent from tonight‚Äôs game but if all things go well, we will see him suit up alongside LeBroLuka Doncic, who joined the Lakers this season, has been a key contributor despite battling minor injuries throughout the year. In his last 20 games, he has averaged 5.8 points, 2.9 rebounds, and 2 assists per game. While his numbers have dipped slightly due to limited minutes, his presence on the court remains vital for the Lakers‚Äô offensive flow and playmaking.The Lakers‚Äô injury report also includes Maxi Kleber, who is ruled out with a foot injury, and Rui Hachimura, listed as day-to-day with a knee issue. However, all eyes are on Luka Doncic, whose calf strain could significantly impact the team‚Äôs performance against a competitive Clippers squad. The Clippers , meanwhile, are dealing with their own injury concerns, as Norman Powell is questionable with a knee issue. Despite this, the Clippers have been in strong form, led by James Harden, who averages 21.8 points per game, and Ivica Zubac, who dominates the boards with 12.5 rebounds per contest.The Lakers, currently 36-21, are outscoring opponents by 1.5 points per game, while the Clippers (32-26) hold a +2.3 scoring differential. With both teams vying for playoff positioning, Friday‚Äôs game carries significant weight.Fans can catch the action live on ESPN, SportsNet LA, or via Fubo, with tip-off scheduled for 10 p.m. ET. As the Lakers and Clippers prepare for another chapter in their storied rivalry, Luka Doncic‚Äôs potential absence looms large, leaving the Lakers to lean heavily on LeBron James and Austin Reaves to carry the offensive load.Also read: Will LeBron James play tonight against the LA Clippers? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 28, 2025) Stay tuned for updates as game time approaches, and the Lakers make a final decision on Luka Doncic‚Äôs availability.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers face the los angeles clippers on friday, february 28. Luka doncic is listed as a game-time decision due to a calf injury. The lakers‚Äô injury report also includes maxi kleber, who is ruled out with a foot injury, and rui hachimura, listed as day-to-day with a knee issue.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve been having some seriously awkward chats‚Äù: Taylor Swift‚Äôs family expresses concern over recent challenges in her relationship with Travis Kelce
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift has been told to lay low for the time being in regard to the latest bout of public backlash

Travis Kelce and the Kansas City Chiefs weren't the only disappointed party following their 40-22 Super Bowl defeat to the Philadelphia Eagles. Taylor Swift, who was present at the event to cheer on Kelce, had a rude welcome from the crowd at Caesars Superdome with fans booing her.After already selling out the same venue with her "Eras Tour," the Super Bowl audience was much less welcoming. As per Radar Online, the drama Swift experienced at the high-profile event has reportedly impacted her relationship with Kelce, with insiders claiming she has been advised to keep a low profile for the meantime.Travis Kelce and the Kansas City Chiefs weren't alone in the disappointment of their 40-22 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles in the Super Bowl. Taylor Swift, who was on hand to cheer on Kelce, received an unwelcome and rough reception when fans at Caesars Superdome booed her. Swift had only months before performed in front of a sold-out crowd at the same stadium as part of her "Eras Tour," but the Super Bowl crowd was not nearly as hospitable.The bad press directed towards Swift at one of the nation's largest sporting events has allegedly impacted her and Kelce's relationship. A Radar Online report states that rumor is circulating that the "Fortnight" songstress has been told to lay low for the time being in regard to the latest bout of public backlash."They‚Äôve been having some seriously awkward chats with their teams about when they should step out in public and what the vibe should even be like," Radar Online's source revealed. Swift's inner circle expressed concern about a new development in her relationship with Kelce. "Friends and family are on high alert, worried about the couple and hoping they can navigate through this tricky phase in their love saga," Radar Online's source said.Also Read: ‚ÄúWasted at the bar with pals‚Äù: Taylor Swift reportedly has a few non-negotiable rules for Travis Kelce to follow strictly Despite the current challenges, Swift‚Äôs family and friends can find reassurance in the strength of her relationship with Kelce, which has lasted over a year. While this situation is unfamiliar territory, the couple has faced their share of obstacles throughout their time together. This is simply another hurdle in their journey, one they will hopefully overcome as a team.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and the kansas city chiefs weren't the only disappointed party following their 40-22 super bowl defeat to the philadelphia eagles. Taylor swift, who was present at the event to cheer on kelce, had a rude welcome from the crowd at caesars superdome with fans booing her.

Article Title: Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal gave Damon Wayans a Lakers ring as a reward for a surprising reason: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs that special‚Äù
Article Text:
Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and Damon Wayans. Image via: Paras Griffin/ Getty | Getty Images

Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal and

Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal gifted Damon Wayans a championship ring for roasting his free throws



Image via: Rich Fury/Getty Images

Damon Wayans Leaves Shaq In TEARS, Reacts To Luka‚Äôs Huge Game & Hilarious BPS vs WPS

Basketball and Hollywood have often crossed paths, but few friendships in the sports and entertainment world are as unique as the one between Damon Wayans . The legendary comedian was recently a guest on The Big Podcast with Shaq , where he revealed that O‚ÄôNeal had given him one of his prized championship rings for relentlessly mocking his missed free throws. Damon Wayans has been a comic powerhouse, and his legacy is continued with his son‚Äôs charismatic prowess in the field of entertainment. NBA Hall of Famer Shaquille O‚ÄôNeal has been a close friend of Wayans Sr. and appeared as a guest in the recent episode of The Big Podcast with Shaq. They discussed about the ring that Shaq gave Wayans for taunting him after the former Lakers legend missed three free throws.‚ÄúI got a beautiful three-peat ring,‚Äù Wayans said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never worn it, it‚Äôs that special,‚Äù he added.This unexpected gift wasn‚Äôt just a random gesture‚Äî it was Shaq‚Äôs way of showing appreciation for Wayans‚Äô courtside antics, which kept him entertained during his time with the Los Angeles Lakers.‚ÄúAs a professional athlete, it‚Äôs our job to entertain. So, I can remember going to the game and being like ‚ÄòOh s**t, that‚Äôs Damon Wayans‚Äô, ‚ÄòOh s**t, that‚Äôs Eddie Murphy‚Äô, ‚ÄòOh s**t, that‚Äôs Tom Cruise‚Äô. I wanted to give them the joy that they gave me,‚Äù Shaq said.Shaq‚Äôs struggles at the free-throw line were certainly hilarious for Wayans. He was a regular at Lakers games and wasn‚Äôt shy about heckling O‚ÄôNeal every time he missed a shot. ‚ÄúDamon was always there. And when I missed free throws, he‚Äôd give it to me‚Ä¶‚Äù the NBA Hall of Famer continued, adding, ‚ÄúSo, whenever I would win, I would find out where my favorite people lived at, and I would just send them that as a token of my appreciation.‚ÄùInstead of taking offense, Shaq found joy in the playful ribbing. In fact, he credits Wayans and his legendary comedic family for being a source of relief during the intense grind of an NBA season.O‚ÄôNeal explained that, as a professional athlete, it was his job to entertain, just as actors and comedians do in Hollywood. Growing up watching stars like Wayans, Eddie Murphy, and Tom Cruise, he felt a deep respect for the people who brought him joy. Gifting memorabilia, including his championship rings, was his way of giving back.Beyond the courtside jokes, Shaq has maintained a close relationship with the entire Wayans family , crediting them with helping him escape the pressures of his basketball career.‚ÄúThe Wayans family was at the apex of making me laugh,‚Äù O‚ÄôNeal said, explaining how their comedic genius provided much-needed distractions from the rigors of life in the NBA.Also Read: Shaq Wants Luka Doncic to Be Pettier: Is He Holding Back Against the Mavericks? Wayans has been a well-known celebrity in Hollywood as a stand-up comedian, actor, producer, and writer. He and his son Damon Wayans Jr. appeared in the recent CBS sitcom Poppa's House. Additionally, he has Lethal Weapon, Major Payne, My Wife and Kids, The Last Boy Scout, and several other movies and shows to his credit. Wayans' love for basketball and his friendship with NBA legends like Shaq and Michael Jordan also makes his name known in the basketball community.
Article Summary: Shaquille o‚Äôneal gifted damon wayans a championship ring for roasting his free throws. Shaq credits wayans and his comedic family for being a source of relief during the intense grind of an nba season. Wayans has been a well-known celebrity in hollywood as a stand-up comedian, actor, producer, and writer.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe doesn‚Äôt quite have that same explosiveness‚Äù: Mike Johnson noted that Auston Matthews appears less sharp, likely due to fatigue rather than injury
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Mike Johnson on Auston Matthews‚Äô recent struggles

Mike Johnson , a former NHL player and analyst, expressed concern over Auston Matthews ' current form, noting a slight dip in his explosiveness on the ice. He highlighted that Matthews' game relies on quick bursts, not necessarily outright speed, but rather his ability to stop and start efficiently, win puck battles, protect the puck, and get his shot off effectively.Mike Johnson observed that Auston Matthews seems to be lacking that extra sharpness, which could be due to fatigue rather than an injury. However, he stressed that Matthews needs to regain this aspect of his game, especially with the playoffs approaching, as it plays a crucial role in his overall effectiveness on the ice.During an interview on First Up on Thursday, Mike Johnson remarked,"When he‚Äôs at his best, he has that fractionally more explosive burst in his game. Not necessarily blowing past guys, but stopping and starting, winning puck battles, protecting the puck, and getting his shot off. Right now, he doesn‚Äôt quite have that same explosiveness. That might be more fatigue-related than injury-related, but it‚Äôs something he needs to get back."In addition to Matthews' form, Johnson also touched on Toronto's potential interest in acquiring veteran forward Brayden Schenn ahead of the trade deadline. While Schenn could bring valuable experience and physicality to the roster, Johnson questioned whether the cost of acquiring him‚Äîlikely in the form of draft picks or young assets‚Äîwould be too steep for the Leafs, given their current needs and salary cap situation.As the playoffs approach, the Maple Leafs will need their star players, especially Auston Matthews, to be at their best. While the team has performed well despite his dip in production, his ability to regain his explosiveness could be the key to a deep postseason run. Meanwhile, the front office faces crucial decisions, including whether acquiring a player like Brayden Schenn is worth the potential cost. With big games ahead, all eyes will be on Matthews and the Leafs as they push toward the playoffs.Also Read: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been worried‚Äù: Nick Robertson sent a blunt message clarifying his future with the Toronto Maple Leafs
Article Summary: Mike johnson, a former nhl player and analyst, expressed concern over auston matthews'current form, noting a slight dip in his explosiveness on the ice. He highlighted that matthews' game relies on quick bursts, not necessarily outright speed. Johnson also touched on toronto's potential interest in acquiring veteran forward brayden schenn ahead of the trade deadline.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI would give up‚Äù: Boston Bruins David Pastr≈à√°k is willing to sacrifice his individual point streak to get the team back on track
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

David Pastr≈à√°k would happily exchange his individual streak for the Bruins

Joe Sacco and select players speak to the media following the Bruins 2-1 loss to the Islanders.

The Boston Bruins played short forward during their game against the New York Islanders on Thursday evening. David Pastr≈à√°k was the only scorer for the Bruins as they lost to the New York Islanders 2-1, taking his point streak in the NHL to 16 games.This equals the Czech record which was earlier established by Jaromir J√°gr and Robert Lang. The 28-year-old winger, who has recorded 14 goals and 17 assists in this span, reached a milestone with his 800th NHL point. Pastr≈à√°k scored in the 51st minute on a feed from Pavel Zacha, cutting the deficit to 2-1, but Boston could not take advantage, losing its fifth consecutive game.David Pastr≈à√°k stretched his point streak to 16 games, but it was overshadowed by the loss of the Boston Bruins 2-1 at home to the New York Islanders. Even while Pastr≈à√°k reached that benchmark, he complained about how nothing matters in his individual performance if the team itself is underperforming. With the Bruins suffering their fifth straight loss (0-3-2), he conceded he would happily exchange his individual streak for wins, pointing to the frustration of the team as they seek to end their slump."Yeah, I mean, I said it ‚Äî I would give up the point streak for wins,‚Äù he said. "I‚Äôm playing a team sport, so I just want to get it up and get back on a winning streak. I‚Äôm not focusing on anything else other than our team game right now, and obviously, trying to do my best to help the team. But that's not my focus, honestly.‚ÄùPastrnak reached 800 NHL points in a loss against Islanders, scoring in the third period but making 38 saves. The Bruins outshot the Islanders, but couldn't score enough goals. ‚Äú(I am) frustrated,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúBoth goalies played an amazing game, (it's a) tough break. Sorokin had a great night. It's frustrating, obviously.‚ÄùDavid Pastrnak, who has scored 31 goals and 42 assists in 60 games, is determined to help the Boston Bruins return to winning ways, despite the team's struggles, as personal success is insufficient.Also Read: ‚ÄúHe's not at his best‚Äù: Oilers coach Kris Knoblauch shared his candid thoughts on Connor McDavid‚Äôs recent performances He was selected by the Bruins in the first round, 25th overall, of the 2014 NHL entry draft and made his NHL debut that year. Internationally, Pastr≈à√°k has played for the Czech national team at both the junior and senior level, including at four World Championships. He is widely regarded as one of the best players in the National Hockey League.
Article Summary: David pastr≈à√°k reached 800 nhl points in a loss against islanders. The 28-year-old winger scored in the third period but made 38 saves. The bruins outshot the islanders, but couldn't score enough goals. The loss was boston's fifth straight loss (0-3-2)

Article Title: Icc Champions Trophy: Former Pakistan captain: 'Why is no one talking about English cricket?'
Article Text:
England and Pakistan cricketers

Poll Which Aspect Defines a Champion Team in the ICC Champions Trophy? Handling Pressure in Knockouts Consistent Performance

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Can India overcome New Zealand in the ICC Champions Trophy?

Champions Trophy: How good is Virat Kohli in football? | Rishabh Pant recovers from viral

DUBAI: At a time when Pakistan's cricket team has been panned left, right and centre by many of the country's former players - now experts on TV shows - and the disgruntled public, there is someone who is not willing to be as harsh on Mohammad Rizwan & Co. In an exclusive interview with TOI from London, where he currently lives, former Pakistan captain Asif Iqbal asserted that "nothing is wrong with Pakistan cricket ," while pointing out that "no one is talking about what's wrong with English cricket ."Like Pakistan, England too were knocked out of the 2025 ICC Champions Trophy , when they lost their first two matches in Group B to Australia and Afghanistan at Lahore."Nothing is wrong with Pakistan cricket. The other teams are playing better cricket than Pakistan. Whether batting first or chasing, we lost because our opponents played better cricket than us. Why is no one talking about what‚Äôs wrong with English cricket? Batting first, they couldn‚Äôt defend 351, and batting second, they couldn‚Äôt chase down 326. I have a totally different view on this," Iqbal told TOI.Summing up Pakistan's six-wicket defeat to India at the Dubai International Stadium beautifully in one line, Iqbal, 82, who played 58 Tests and 10 ODIs for Pakistan between 1964 to 1980, said, "We were outplayed in every department, except the toss!""The reason for this hype is the expectation of the supporters of both teams that their team is better than their opponents and not realistic enough to accept that the present Indian team is on the top of rankings and we are at the bottom," Iqbal said.Explaining his point, Iqbal said, "Look, I want to emphasise here that the expectations of the Indian and Pakistani fans makes an Indo-Pak contest look like the clash of the titans. The fact is that you call it a clash of the titans when, for example, in tennis, No 1 ranked player plays a No 3, or No 4 ranked player, it will be billed as the clash of the titans. However, if a superstar and all-time great like Novak Djokovic plays a 100th ranked player in the second round, he will be expected to win, and if he loses, it will be termed as a 'shock'. Likewise, if Pakistan beat India, or any other team, in an ICC event, that other team must have a very bad day. And I'm not belittling Pakistan here, but stating the reality. Pakistan has lost to a second-string South Africa and New Zealand at home recently. So, for me, it wasn't a surprise that they lost to India and New Zealand in the 2025 Champions Trophy. Ultimately, these are the players that we have. It's better to give them confidence. TV pe gaali-goj (criticising them) won't help."While India aren‚Äôt playing a match at Sharjah, a place where Iqbal was instrumental in starting international cricket and once a famous venue for India-Pakistan matches, the Pakistan great was saddened by India refusing to travel to Pakistan to play their matches in the 2025 Champions Trophy. "More importantly India is not playing in Pakistan in an ICC tournament. Really sad." he said.Raving about Indian superstar Virat Kohli , who bounced back into form by scoring his 51st ODI hundred, against Pakistan at the Dubai International Stadium on Sunday night, Iqbal said, "Yet again, Virat has shown that form is temporary, but class is permanent. The beauty about Virat is that when the stakes are higher, his concentration levels go up, and his delivery rate goes higher. It's amazing how he manages to keep doing this," Iqbal gushed.Impressed by how the likes of Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer have added muscle to India's ODI batting line-up, he said, "India are fortunate to have the best bench strength in the cricketing world. If someone is injured or unavailable, they immediately have someone to replace him. It means a lot for the future of their game. Not many teams have this luxury.‚ÄùPraising Afghanistan for their fine show in ICC tournaments, Iqbal said, "Before the tournament began, I had said that I expected Afghanistan to beat at least one top ranked team in their group, and they've done that by beating England. They are building into a good side, one of the top teams in world cricket."
Article Summary: Former pakistan captain asif iqbal tells toi that "nothing is wrong with pakistan cricket" the 82-year-old also says that "no one is talking about what's wrong with english cricket" pakistan lost six-wicket defeat to india at the dubai international stadium. It's amazing how he manages to keep doing this," iqbal gushed.

Article Title: Anthony Edwards‚Äô blunt message to Barack Obama gets big reaction from Carmelo Anthony
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards. Christian Petersen/Getty Images

Barak Obama

Carmelo Anthony

Carmelo Anthony reacts to Anthony Edwards‚Äô comment to Barack Obama



Anthony Edwards. Image via: David Berding/Getty Images

New York Knicks' Fatal Flaw, Cade Cunningham's Arrival, Kevin Durant's Next Move & More

It was not long before Anthony Edwards made headlines after his surprising, hilarious banter with former President of the United Stateswent viral.recently put the incident into the spotlight again after discussing it in a recent chat at 7PM In Brooklyn podcast. Anthony praised Edwards‚Äô honest response in the lighthearted moment with the former president.Netflix‚Äôs hit docuseries Court of Gold has given basketball fans an inside look at the 2024 Paris Olympics, highlighting Team USA‚Äôs journey to gold. The exchange between Minnesota Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards and former U.S. President Barack Obama grabbed wide public attention. The clip, which has since gone viral, revealed Edwards‚Äô signature bravado and has sparked mixed reactions.In one of the more talked-about scenes from the docuseries, Obama was seen interacting with Team USA players, praising Philadelphia 76ers center Joel Embiid ‚Äôs skills. As Obama complimented Embiid, Edwards wasted no time interjecting.‚ÄúI‚Äôm the truth,‚Äù he declared confidently, leaving the former president amused.Obama quickly turned to LeBron James for his take, seemingly calling on the NBA icon to check Edwards' self-proclaimed status. The moment was lighthearted, but it divided opinions.Carmelo Anthony, a ten-time NBA All-Star and veteran of multiple Olympic campaigns, had nothing but praise for Edwards‚Äô exchange with Obama. On his 7PM in Brooklyn podcast, Melo made it clear that he respected Ant‚Äôs confidence, saying, ‚ÄúMan, they was just having fun. Obama understood, it was just in that moment.‚ÄùHe also doubled down on his appreciation for Edwards staying true to himself, adding, ‚ÄúI f**ks with that.‚ÄùThe director of the Netflix docuseries, Jake Rogal, also responded to the incident in a previous chat with Variety.‚ÄúThat moment with Anthony Edwards and President Obama was real. Anthony is totally himself, no matter who you are, and President Obama knows how to disarm and let people feel comfortable,‚Äù the director shared.Also Read: What Happened Between Anthony Edwards and Jarred Vanderbilt? Inside the Los Angeles Lakers vs Minnesota Timberwolves Match Of course, Ant-Man has been one of the outspoken basketball stars, but it has landed him into some heated moments as well. Edwards is likely to face a one-game suspension after being ejected in the third quarter of Thursday night‚Äôs matchup against the Los Angeles Lakers. The ejection marked his 16th technical foul of the season, triggering an automatic suspension per NBA rules. Additionally, Edwards, who recently rejected the face of the league accolades of fans, could face a fine for throwing the ball into the stands after being tossed from the game. The 23-year-old got into a fight with Lakers star Jarred Vanderbilt, which stole the spotlight of the game where the Minnesota Timberwolves faced crushing 111-102 defeat. Critics have called out the incident, saying that the young athlete must contain his anger.
Article Summary: Carmelo anthony praised anthony edwards' honest response in the lighthearted moment with the former president. The clip, which has since gone viral, revealed edwards‚Äô signature bravado and has sparked mixed reactions. Edwards is likely to face a one-game suspension after being ejected in the third quarter of thursday‚Äôs matchup against the los angeles lakers.

NEW DELHI: A determined India will face New Zealand in their final Group A clash of the ICC Champions Trophy on Sunday. Both teams have already secured a place in the semifinals, with the winner set to top the group.Led by Rohit Sharma, India sealed their semifinal spot with back-to-back wins over Bangladesh and arch-rivals Pakistan. Similarly, New Zealand secured victories against Pakistan and Bangladesh to book their place in the knockout stage.In-form batter Virat Kohli will look to make the most of his 300th ODI appearance, coming off a match-winning century against Pakistan in the previous game. Notably, Kohli also played his 200th ODI against New Zealand and scored a century on that occasion.Vice-captain Shubman Gill is India's leading run-scorer in the tournament so far, amassing 147 runs in two matches, followed by Kohli with 122 runs.On the bowling front, Mohammed Shami has been India's standout performer with five wickets, while Harshit Rana has picked up four scalps.For New Zealand, Tom Latham leads the run charts with 173 runs, followed by Rachin Ravindra (112) and Will Young (107). Michael Bracewell and William O'Rourke have been their top wicket-takers, claiming five dismissals each.India have a superior ODI record against New Zealand, winning 60 of their 118 meetings.New Zealand have claimed 50 victories, while one match ended in a tie and seven had no result.In their most recent ODI encounter, India triumphed over New Zealand by 70 runs in the 2023 World Cup semifinal at Mumbai‚Äôs Wankhede Stadium.The ICC Champions Trophy match between India and New Zealand will take place on Sunday, March 2.The ICC Champions Trophy match between India and New Zealand will be played at Dubai International Stadium.The ICC Champions Trophy match between India and New Zealand is scheduled to begin at 2:30 PM, with the toss at 2:00 PM.The ICC Champions Trophy match between India and New Zealand will be broadcast on Star Sports Network and live-streamed on JioHotstar.The India vs New Zealand match will begin at 1 PM in Dubai.Viewers in the USA can watch the upcoming India vs New Zealand Champions Trophy Group A match on Fubo TV.Canadian cricket fans can also access the crucial Group A encounter between India vs New Zealand through Fubo TV's service.You can follow live updates of the ICC Champions Trophy match between India and New Zealand on: Rohit Sharma(c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Axar Patel, KL Rahul(w), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Harshit Rana, Mohammed Shami, Kuldeep Yadav, Rishabh Pant, Washington Sundar, Varun Chakravarthy, Arshdeep Singh.: Will Young, Devon Conway, Kane Williamson, Rachin Ravindra, Tom Latham(w), Glenn Phillips, Michael Bracewell, Mitchell Santner(c), Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, William ORourke, Daryl Mitchell, Nathan Smith, Mark Chapman, Jacob Duffy.
Article Summary: India face new zealand in their final group a clash of the icc champions trophy on sunday. Article Title: ‚ÄúWasted at the bar with pals‚Äù: Taylor Swift reportedly has a few non-negotiable rules for Travis Kelce to follow strictly
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce has three hard-and-fast rules in his relationship with Taylor Swift

Travis Kelce, the 35-year-old Kansas City Chiefs player, allegedly has three hard-and-fast rules in his relationship with Taylor Swift, also 35. The two, who started dating over the summer of 2023, are frequently spotted together and have both attained tremendous success in their careers‚ÄîSwift as one of the world's largest music icons and Kelce as a vital member of the Chiefs. Even with their great push, the Chiefs failed to reach the Super Bowl following a 40-22 defeat to the Philadelphia Eagles on February 9.The Kansas City Chiefs superstar Travis Kelce has three hard and fast rules when it comes to his relationship with singer Taylor Swift. Dating since summer 2023, the two are regularly spotted together and are a hot topic for fans and the media. Swift is among the world's leading musicians, and Kelce is an integral part of the Chiefs, who came up short of the Super Bowl after a 40-22 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles on February 9.According to the Life and Style Magazine, through MSN, Taylor Swift apparently has some 'rules' about how Kelce can stay in contact with her and whom the football player can socialize with during his free time.‚ÄúThey‚Äôll be doing lots of texting and calling, too, but Taylor likes to see Travis in real time,‚Äù a source said. ‚ÄúShe likes to know where he is and who he‚Äôs with. It‚Äôs not that she doesn‚Äôt trust him; she just wants to feel connected. Taylor loves Travis‚Äô energy and spontaneity, but she doesn‚Äôt want him wasted at the bar with pals. He can celebrate his wins in style with her and their friends.‚ÄùBeing a high-level athlete, Travis Kelce probably does not have much of his free time spent in bars, considering the strenuous nature of his profession. Otherwise, when he is not training or on the field, he co-hosts the extremely popular New Heights podcast with his brother Jason Kelce, a retired NFL great. The podcast has attracted an enormous following and gives fans an inside look at football and the brothers' personal lives.The third rule in the relationship of Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift is one that is most argued about. The couple has reportedly agreed to not be seen with others of the opposite gender to avoid gossip and speculation. This ruling, though questionable, is probably a move to preserve their privacy and keep away from extra reinforcement from their respective professions.‚ÄúTaylor‚Äôs been in this biz long enough to know what comes with being in the spotlight,‚Äù they added.The Chiefs star recently disclosed his relationship during an appearance on the Stephen A. Smith Show. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm enjoying all aspects of life," said Kelce. "Me and Taylor are happy and I couldn‚Äôt be happier to enjoy that confidence off the field and all the support I could ever ask for at the stadium."He added, ‚ÄúI think personally, the beauty of being in a very strong relationship is that you get that support to be able to come in and focus on your craft, focus on being the best version of you. I think I‚Äôm as focused as I‚Äôve ever been on my job and being the best player that I could possibly be week in, week out for this team."Also Read: ‚ÄúEnjoyed a quiet night‚Äù: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift return to the spotlight following international getaway after Chiefs' Super Bowl loss
Article Summary: Travis kelce, 35, and taylor swift, also 35, started dating over the summer of 2023. The two are regularly spotted together and are a hot topic for fans and the media. The couple has reportedly agreed to not be seen with others of the opposite gender to avoid gossip and speculation.

Article Title: Magic Johnson sends earnest praise for Jayson Tatum, Donovan Mitchell after Cleveland Cavaliers vs Boston Celtics showdown
Article Text:
Magic Johnson. Image via: Vianney Le Caer/invision/ AP

Magic Johnson

Jayson Tatum

Donovan Mitchell

Magic Johnson praised the high-octane Cleveland Cavaliers vs Boston Celtics showdown



The Cleveland Cavaliers recently secured a 123-116 victory over the Boston Celtics at TD Garden. Lakers legendpraised the thrilling matchup, sharing his appreciation for the competition in a post on X. He also had high praise for a Celtics forward,, and Cavaliers standout. Both teams remain among the league‚Äôs best, with the Cavaliers boasting an impressive 49-10 record, while the Celtics stand at 42-18.Magic Johnson has been quite vocal about his likings, especially his favorite games, NBA athletes, and other aspects of the league. The NBA Hall of Famer recently watched the high-octane Cleveland Cavaliers vs Boston Celtics showdown on February 28 and shared his honest thoughts on the matchup.Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum has earned earnest praise for the former Lakers legend as he added 46 points, 16 rebounds, and nine assists. He also showered praise for Cavaliers guard Donovan Mitchell. Speaking of the game, Johnson wrote, ‚ÄúThe Cavaliers beat the Celtics 123-116 in tonight‚Äôs game, which was a game of halfs. Jayson Tatum did something that no other NBA player in history has done scoring 30 points, 9 rebounds, and 7 assists in the first half but the second half was all Donovan Mitchell!‚ÄùIn another post, he extended his excitement of the game, adding up his praise for Mitchell. ‚ÄúIn the Celtics vs. Cavaliers game, Cleveland‚Äôs Donovan Mitchell was superb and finished with 41 points. ü§ØHe got a lot of help in the 4th quarter from Evan Mobley who had a 17 point, 12 rebound double-double and did most of his damage in the 4th quarter.‚ÄùThe Cleveland Cavaliers extended their scorching nine-game winning streak, claiming their position as the best team in the NBA (49-10).Donovan Mitchell was the driving force behind Cleveland‚Äôs rally, delivering a stunning 41-point performance, including 26 in the second half. The All-Star guard took control in the clutch, sinking a crucial floater to break a 114-114 tie.Darius Garland chipped in with 20 points, helping Cleveland notch its seventh straight road win as their team continued dominance away from home.Despite a season-best 46-point, 16-rebound, nine-assist effort from Tatum, the Celtics fell short for the second consecutive game. Tatum put up an incredible 19-of-37 shooting performance, but the absence of Kristaps Porzingis and Jrue Holiday proved costly.Also Read: Magic Johnson shares a heartfelt birthday message for his oldest son Andre Johnson: "You've made me so proud" Jaylen Brown added 37 points, but the Cavaliers‚Äô late surge was too much to overcome. Finally, the victory came for the Cavaliers, dominating the home team before the TD Garden crowd. Regardless, the matchup was action-packed, with both sides giving their top-notch performance, which propelled several NBA veterans and analysts to weigh in with their opinion about the game, which includes Johnson.
Article Summary: Magic johnson praised the high-octane cleveland cavaliers vs boston celtics showdown. Lakers legend shared his appreciation for the competition in a post on x. He also had high praise for celtics forward jayson tatum and cavaliers standout donovan mitchell. The cleveland cavaliers recently secured a 123-116 victory over the boston celtics at td garden.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHe is nothing but a traitor‚Äù: Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs wife‚Äôs post sparks controversy, igniting ongoing trolling from the Hockey community
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Fans are sill not happy with Wayne Gretzky, calls him a traitor

Ben Steiner reported on Twitter, stating that Wayne Gretzky gave Team USA a thumbs up. The atmosphere at the TD Garden in Boston was filled with excitement as the 4 Nations Face-Off championship game between Team USA and Canada took place, with the Great One among the celebrities and prominent figures.The gesture that Wayne Gretzky displayed towards the American squad sparked significant reactions among Canadian fans. Recently, following a brief period of quiet, Janet Gretzky, unveiled a letter penned by Canadian hockey legend Bobby Orr addressed to her husband. However, fans didn't take this lightly.Canadian hockey fans have been expressing their disapproval of Team Canada's honorary captain, Wayne Gretzky, who showed support for Team USA players during a recent game. Upon their arrival at the Montreal Bell Centre, Team USA received boos, while Team Canada faced similar reactions at TD Garden. Gretzky, who was serving as Team Canada's honorary captain, did not wear Canadian colors during the event, leading to criticism from Canadian fans who saw this as a lack of support for his home country.Political tensions between Canada and the United States are escalating due to President Donald Trump's recent remarks. Recently, his wife, Janet Gretzky, revealed a letter written by Canadian hockey legend Bobby Orr to her husband. Orr offered a straightforward evaluation. He felt a sense of disappointment regarding the reaction of the Canadian fans towards Gretzky during the championship game.However, this didn't stop fans trolling Gretzky, with one individual labeling him, ‚ÄúF Wayne Gretzky‚Ä¶ Traitor.‚Äù In a comparable sentiment, this supporter expressed, ‚ÄúHe is nothing but a traitor to Canada now.‚Äù Nonetheless, this individual held a firm perspective on Janet‚Äôs message, asserting, ‚ÄúNot sure there‚Äôs a more boomer response than having your wife post a photo of a physical letter you received to social media.‚ÄùCanadian sports icon Wayne Gretzky has faced backlash for his association with US political figures, particularly President Trump. Discussions in Canadian media have raised concerns about his status as a sports icon. Public dissatisfaction has led to a petition to remove Gretzky's name from an Edmonton highway, arguing his actions do not reflect Canadian hockey values.Also Read: ‚ÄúIt has broken his heart‚Äù: Wayne Gretzky's wife says he is heartbroken by the recent backlash he has received for his friendship Donald Trump Hockey elicits strong emotions from players and fans, but debates persist about Gretzky's controversial actions. Despite his commitment to his country, including supporting the American team during the 4 Nations Face-Off, his loyalty remains unquestioned by those who recognize him as more than just a hockey icon.
Article Summary: Canadian hockey fans have been expressing their disapproval of team canada's honorary captain, wayne gretzky. The great one gave team usa a thumbs up during the 4 nations face-off championship game in boston. His wife revealed a letter written by canadian hockey legend bobby orr addressed to her husband.

Article Title: Joe Burrow gets dragged into a new controversy and slammed by fans as Bengals‚Äô cafeteria receives lowest ranking
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow Gets Heavily Trolled As The NFLPA Report Reveals Cincinnati Bengals Cafeteria Has Been Poorly Ranked



Fans Are Confused How It Is Possible For Cincinnati Bengals To Serve Low Quality Food To Its Players



Joe Burrow, the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals, has found himself in a new controversy as a recent ranking has been released. As per the recent ranking, the Cincinnati Bengals have scored pretty poorly when it comes to the food that they serve to the players in their cafeteria. But this has not gone down too well with the fans, and Joe Burrow is being brutally trolled for it.As per the recent ranking, their food's freshness was rated 5.49/1,0 while their food had an average rating of 4.82 out of 10. Unfortunately, the Cincinnati Bengals‚Äô cafeteria food and freshness has ranked last among all teams. But fans are in no mood for any sympathy and have dragged Joe Burrow into this.Warren Sharp recently made a post that read as ‚ÄúBengals Cafeteria worse than prison‚Äù and fans have attacked the players. A fan wrote, ‚ÄúLMAO poor burrow has to walk thru traffic to get to the practice field and then they don't even feed him‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúJoe Burrow bringing his meals to the facility so he can eat.‚ÄùA third fan wrote, ‚ÄúThey need to save all that money to pay Joe, Chase and Higgins‚Äù, while another user wrote, ‚ÄúImagine what Joe Burrow and Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase could do if they were served food greater than middle school cafeteria level.‚ÄùMany fans also spoke about how the players have a massive net worth, and yet they are complaining about the food that is being served. A fan wrote, ‚ÄúTeams should supply some food. But why should they supply 3 meals a day? These guys make millions in most cases. They can feed themselves a meal or two a day.‚ÄùOther fans are confused how it is possible for the Cincinnati Bengals to serve low quality food. A fan wrote, ‚ÄúHow in the world could it be possible to have such a fiasco in a multi-billion-dollar business?‚ÄùThe team, Cincinnati Bengals, has not issued a statement about this poor ranking yet. It is not just the food that the team has ranked pretty poorly in. As per Warren Sharp‚Äôs post, even the dining area has been ranked poorly and got a score of 5.98 out of 10, which has ranked it in the 30th place out of 32 teams.Apart from this, the Cincinnati Bengals are also asking for three meals a day instead of two. Apparently, the Cincinnati Bengals are one of two teams that dont provide three meals a day.A statement from the team and the players is yet to be issued. Joe Burrow too is yet to react on the trolling he has received. Apart from this controversy, there are a lot of rumours about his personal life but Joe Burrow has kept it private. He was rumoured to be dating famous model Olivia Ponton but he has not opened up about it.Also Read: Joe Burrow‚Äôs old video resurfaces as he talks about quirky topics and fans fall for his "nerdy" charm
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals' cafeteria food and freshness has ranked last among all teams. Fans are in no mood for any sympathy and have dragged joe burrow into this. Cincinnati bengals are one of two teams that dont provide three meals a day. The team has not issued a statement about this poor ranking yet.
